https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gdKbs1aXdbXVx3HKyWZf3oTez2o.jpg Two old friends who share a life-long secret are forced to face the truth—and its consequences—when one is diagnosed with a terminal illness and wants to put her affairs in order. Bound By a Secret
